languages.text: "Я боялась, этот момент никогда не наступит. Прощайте, Вольный Торговец. Я никогда не забуду человека, столь плотно закутанного в сталь и серебро, как вы".

traits.locale_text: "Я боялась, этот момент никогда не наступит. Прощайте, Вольный Торговец. Я никогда не забуду человека, столь плотно закутанного в сталь и серебро, как вы".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I feared this moment would never come. Farewell, Rogue Trader. I will never forget the {mf|man|woman} so tightly clad in steel and silver."
languages.original_text: "Я боялась, этот момент никогда не наступит. Прощайте, Вольный Торговец. Я никогда не забуду человека, столь плотно закутанного в сталь и серебро, как вы".

traits.locale_text: "I was afraid this moment would never come. Farewell, Rogue Trader. I will never forget a {mf|man|woman} so tightly clad in steel and silver."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was afraid this moment would never come. Farewell, Rogue Trader. I will never forget a {mf|man|woman} so tightly clad in steel and silver."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I feared this moment would never come. Farewell, Rogue Trader. I will never forget the {mf|man|woman} so tightly clad in steel and silver."

traits.locale_text: "I feared this moment would never come. Farewell, Rogue Trader. I will never forget the {mf|man|woman} so tightly clad in steel and silver."

traits.locale_text: "I feared this moment would never come. Farewell, Rogue Trader. I will never forget the {mf|man|woman} so tightly clad in steel and silver."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我还担心这一刻永远都不会到来呢。永别了，行商浪人，我永远不会忘记那个把自己紧紧裹在钢铁与白银中的{mf|男人|女人}。”
languages.original_text: "I feared this moment would never come. Farewell, Rogue Trader. I will never forget the {mf|man|woman} so tightly clad in steel and silver."

traits.locale_text: “我还担心这一刻永远都不会到来呢。永别了，行商浪人，我永远不会忘记那个把自己紧紧裹在钢铁与白银中的{mf|男人|女人}。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Me temía que este momento nunca llegaría. Adiós, Comerciante Independiente. No olvidaré a es{mf|e hombre|a mujer} ataviad{mf|o|a} de acero y plata».
languages.original_text: "I feared this moment would never come. Farewell, Rogue Trader. I will never forget the {mf|man|woman} so tightly clad in steel and silver."

traits.locale_text: «Me temía que este momento nunca llegaría. Adiós, Comerciante Independiente. No olvidaré a es{mf|e hombre|a mujer} ataviad{mf|o|a} de acero y plata».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「この瞬間が来ないことを願っていました。さようなら、自由開拓者様。鋼鉄と銀を身にまとった{name}様のことは、決して忘れはしません」
languages.original_text: "I feared this moment would never come. Farewell, Rogue Trader. I will never forget the {mf|man|woman} so tightly clad in steel and silver."

traits.locale_text: 「この瞬間が来ないことを願っていました。さようなら、自由開拓者様。鋼鉄と銀を身にまとった{name}様のことは、決して忘れはしません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hatte befürchtet, dieser Moment würde niemals kommen. Lebt wohl, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich werde {mf|den Mann|die Frau} in Stahl und Silber niemals vergessen."
languages.original_text: "I feared this moment would never come. Farewell, Rogue Trader. I will never forget the {mf|man|woman} so tightly clad in steel and silver."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte befürchtet, dieser Moment würde niemals kommen. Lebt wohl, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich werde {mf|den Mann|die Frau} in Stahl und Silber niemals vergessen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je craignais que ce moment n'arrive jamais. Adieu, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je n'oublierai jamais {mf|l'homme|la femme} ceinturée d'acier et d'argent. »
languages.original_text: "I feared this moment would never come. Farewell, Rogue Trader. I will never forget the {mf|man|woman} so tightly clad in steel and silver."

traits.locale_text: « Je craignais que ce moment n'arrive jamais. Adieu, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je n'oublierai jamais {mf|l'homme|la femme} ceinturée d'acier et d'argent. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bu anın asla gelmeyeceğinden korkuyordum. Hoşça kal Hür Tacir. Çelik ve gümüş renkleriyle örtülü {mf|adamı|kadını} asla unutmayacağım."
languages.original_text: "I feared this moment would never come. Farewell, Rogue Trader. I will never forget the {mf|man|woman} so tightly clad in steel and silver."

traits.locale_text: "Bu anın asla gelmemesinden korkuyordum. Hoşça kal Hür Tacir. Çelik ve gümüş renkleriyle örtülü {mf|adamı|kadını} asla unutmayacağım."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
